mapper.select: select log_id, log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, log_describe, in_time, is_handle from sys_logs where log_id = #{logId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_logs(log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, log_describe, in_time, is_handle) values (#{logName}, #{logModule}, #{logInfo}, #{logLevel}, #{logDescribe}, #{inTime}, #{isHandle})

insert into sys_logs(log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, log_describe, in_time, is_handle) values
(#{entity.logName}, #{entity.logModule}, #{entity.logInfo}, #{entity.logLevel}, #{entity.logDescribe}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.isHandle})

insert into sys_logs(log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, log_describe, in_time, is_handle) values
(#{entity.logName}, #{entity.logModule}, #{entity.logInfo}, #{entity.logLevel}, #{entity.logDescribe}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.isHandle})
on duplicate key update log_name = values(log_name), log_module = values(log_module), log_info = values(log_info), log_level = values(log_level), log_describe = values(log_describe), in_time = values(in_time), is_handle = values(is_handle)
mapper.update:
update sys_logs
log_name = #{logName},
log_module = #{logModule},
log_info = #{logInfo},
log_level = #{logLevel},
log_describe = #{logDescribe},
in_time = #{inTime},
is_handle = #{isHandle},
where log_id = #{logId}
